tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have met Dr. Debnath when I was going through unending lows due to a few gynaecological challenges. Through his treatment over a few months I had conceived with my twin baby boys. My pregnancy was also a roller coaster journey with a couple of emergency visits and a hospitalisation prior to delivery. Dr. Debnath was always available on phone to listen to the issues and provides immediate remedies. Finally he did my c-section surgery with best possible care and visited me a couple times after the delivery to make sure I am healing well and babies are doing well too. Myself and my husband are ever indebted to him and we recommend him strongly for any gynaecological consultancies.

Doctor shyamal Kumar debnath is a very efficient Doctor as well as a very good human being too 
I will never forget the way he supported us when my daughter was born, whenever I called him, he always picked up the phone and answered to all our queries even if it was very late at night
He always encourages the patient and answers every question in a very polite manner 
Inside the O T he is very calm and confident (as per my wife) and has a very safe pair of hands 
He is a very good doctor, much better surgeon and a much much better human being 
I recommend everyone to go under his treatment and believe you will never get a better surgeon 
I always pray to God for his sound health and success and believe he will stand by us as a God for coming many many years

******* *** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ****** ** ***** He is humble, down to earth, listens to all the queries very calmly and the most important thing which we usually vouch for is sir is very spontaneous and quick in attending the calls whatever may be the time. I & my wife both will be grateful to sir throughout our life as sir took a very spontaneous decision as my wife‚Äôs BP was extremely high and asked her to get admitted to the hospital and successfully delivered the operation and thus we were blessed with Twins.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I m so much frustrated with the pregnancy releted issue since 2015.i went to the so many doctors. But the treatment was not suitable for me and my health also. Then after some times we were going to the dctr bani mitra's chamber and there I saw shymal debnath sir. Bani sir treated me so gently but bcz  of my pcod I couldn't be able to pregnant. Lastly sir called me and told me that now I think I would like to do the laproscopy to see the falopian tube bcz of any problem in it. I Was scared  and ran into the shymal sir's room and told him that plz sir I don't want to do this plz do something. Then he adviced me to take one medicine name OVARIES plus. And it is fortunately worked. And the 2nd month when I was going for a test and the report was  I m pregnant. I am really very grateful to him and thank him all the time not only for it but also he is a very very good surgeon. His way of surgery is also very good. I will always refer him. Plz go and talk with him. ** ** ********** ** *** **** *** *** ********* Thank u sir.

I came to know  that he will l√≥ok after my delivery case during the 1st phase of Covid lockdown period..My husband was in Ahmedabad due to lockdown...It was a very difficult period for me.But after meeting  Dr. Debnath  everything was super smooth..He saw all my reports online and advised me accordingly..His concern for the patients is nowadays very rare...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Though i had no complication in my pregnancy and everything  still the experience becomes overwhelming for the first time mother.  Dr. Debnath ensured the process to be smooth and with no worries with his experience and humor. He has been very patient regarding every queries i made and explained the situation to me. He delivered my baby and i felt no anxiety during the process as i knew i was in safe hands. ** ****** ** *** **** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shyamal Kumar Debnath is a great doctor! He‚Äôs very understanding and listens to our concerns. He takes time with the patient to help them with their health issues! We have two baby under him.  We Wonderful experience with him  was a wonderful surgeon, and the staff was always helpful and kind. They ensured  my wife had a smooth prep, surgery, and follow-up. We are so glad and would highly recommend to anyone looking for a specialist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Shyamal Kumar debnath is responsible doctor with friendly attitude . My two babies delivered under his supervision. He responded very promptly our calls even it was late night. He is very efficient doctor and took prompt decision in the critical situation. We are very grateful to him.

We are very greatful to Doctor Mr. Shyamal Kumar Debnath  for his responsibility and friendly behavior üôè. He guide my wife 
and my twins baby very well and cares a lot. Even he delivers my twins by his own hand. 
Thank you so much for the kind cooperation. 

Regards,
Mihir and Dwipannita

Very wise and confident doctor. He is humble and his nice behaviour with pregnant women and also with their family members are quite helpful. His treatment and guidance are always there. 
I came across sudden waterbreak at late night before my due date, and Dr Debnath was there to help and guide. I successfully delivered my baby boy with his trusted hands. He is very approachable at any time.

5 months ago delivered my twins under Dr Shyamal Debnath. He is a skilled surgeon and gynecologist. He guided me very well during my entire pregnancy duration... Taken my calls whenever I was in doubt with my condition ( Gestation Diabetes and High pressure). I highly recommend Dr S. Debnath.

*** ******* ** *** ** **** ******* *** ******** ** *******. During my pregnancy, he guided us really well till the birth of my daughter. He came back from half of the road by 9.30pm just ensure a safe delivery. Besides, he's is very nice person who listen to you with full patience.

Dr Shaymal sir is  very helpful and gives the correct advice for the treatment. He diagonized my wife who has PCOS and we had a hassle free delivery without any complication. Thank you sir for all your advice and support specially the day when my baby was born since it was the day after the devastrous Amphan cyclone and you made sure to arrive way before time even though all the places were water logged and roads blocked.

My wife was her patient in 2020 and in the most difficult times of covid he stood by us like a GOD.
We were blessed with a baby girl.
And till then  we had heard that doctors are like Allmighty God.
But honestly telling, he made us feel exactly the same.
Sir.i pray to God that you grow more in life and stay by the people who needs Doctors like you.

Dr. Debnath is very humble and down to earth. He listen to his patients thoroughly and gives correct advice. I had my boy delivered under him this year. I am beta thalasemic career and with his help I had a hassle free delivery.

Dr. Debnath is very efficient in his field and has a pleasant personality. I had my baby boy under him and had a smooth delivery and recovery.

A very experienced and efficient gynecologist. 
He listens to the patients problem and give utmost attention which is very rare these days. 
Credit goes to him for our first and healthy child after a long time.
Thank you Dr Debnath

review:
Dr Shymal Kumar Debnath is excellent human being,very efficient supportive.I will remain greatful when my twin daughter born under his supervision,I remember call him at 6 AM morning on Holi festival day,when entire country on holiday mode,he pick up my call, handed this critical situation of 7 months critical delivery.
I wish him for noble work to society and wish him great career ahead.
May God bless him !!!
Thank you Doctor.

review: ** ******* ***** ******* ** *** ** *** ****   ************* ** ******* ** ******* * He is  carrying the legacy of Dr B K Mitra, He takes care of each patient sincerely, and his way of operation with time and care is the major factor for his popularity

I am absolutely grateful to him for becoming mom of two babies. He was very friendly and helpful in every steps of my motherhood especially for the 1st time of my critical pregnancy. He was accessible whenever I need him for proper suggestions. Thank you doc for your cooperation in my best period of life.

He is very good friendly and familiar Doctor. I had normal pregnancy and consult him. He never give any extra tests or medications , only that you need. Whenever I have faced any problem doctor always available via phone. I went through Cesarean section delivery under his supervision. He always motivated and gave positive vibes. Moreover today I'm enjoying my 3months motherhood only because of him. The most beautiful Prince is on my lap only for Dr. Shyamal Debnath. Thank you sir.
